item.description:
The Japan Festival in Boston will be held today at Town Plaza Square. Please see their webpage for more information about the festival.

This will be our Sangha's first time at the Festival. We need volunteers for the booth to help with information about our Sangha and set up and take down of the booth. This is only the second year for the festival and last year's brought thousands of people out to enjoy the music, art, information and food about Japanese custom and buisinesses in the New England area. Volunteers will meet at the Temple at 7 am or arrange to meet us at the festival site.

Even if you can't volunteer, please consider a visit to this year's festival. Stop by our booth and say hi.

http://www.japanfestivalboston.org

with Gassho,

Ryuoh Shonin
item.name: Japan Festival 2013 (volunteers for our booth)
